The Whale in the Pond: A Mysterious Portal Adventure: In this game, players take on the role of a group of adventurers who stumble upon a mysterious portal in a small pond. As they step through the portal, they find themselves in a vast ocean filled with strange sea creatures and hidden dangers. The players must navigate through the ocean, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of the portal to find their way back home.

The Whale in the Pond: A Race Against Time: In this game, players are challenged to race against time to save a group of whales trapped in the pond. The players must navigate through the pond, avoiding obstacles and collecting power-ups to increase their speed and reach the trapped whales before time runs out. The game becomes increasingly difficult as the players progress, with more obstacles and challenges to overcome.

The Whale in the Pond: A Treasure Hunt Adventure: In this game, players take on the role of treasure hunters searching for a legendary treasure hidden in the pond. The players must explore the pond, solving puzzles and uncovering clues to find the treasure. Along the way, they will encounter various sea creatures and obstacles that they must overcome to reach the treasure.

The Whale in the Pond: A Battle for Survival: In this game, players are placed in a world where the pond is under attack by a group of hostile sea creatures. The players must navigate through the pond, fighting off the sea creatures and collecting resources to build up their defenses. As they progress, the players will uncover the reason behind the attack and must work together to defeat the leader of the sea creatures and save the pond.

The Whale in the Pond: A Virtual Reality Adventure: In this game, players are transported into a virtual reality world where they find themselves in the pond. The players must navigate through the virtual world, interacting with the environment and the sea creatures to complete challenges and uncover secrets. As they progress, the players will encounter various challenges and obstacles that they must overcome to reach the end of the game.
